property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Nature school. Fire spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Quick Summoning: Once per round, the Beastmaster may summon a Level 1 Animal creature as a quick spell. PET: When a friendly non-Legendary animal creature comes into play, you may make it your Pet. Pay mana equal to the creatures Level +1, then place the Pet maker on it. Pet gains Melee +1, Armor +1, and Life +3. Whenever Pet is in the same zone as his Beastmaster, it gains an additional Melee +1. If Pet is destroyed, you may assign the marker again in the same manner when a new animal is summoned. Beastmaster has the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Holy school. Dark spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Divine Reward: Once per round, if the Priestess casts and resolves a Holy incantation spell, or reveals a Holy enchantment spell that she controls, she gains 1 life. Restore: As a quick spell, the Priestess can remove one condition marker from a friendly creature up to 1 zone away by paying its removal cost. As a full action spell, she can remove as many condition markers as she wishes from that creature by paying their removal costs.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Dark and Fire schools. Holy spells cost triple during spellbook creation.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Curseweaving: Once per round, if a creature is destroyed that has 1 or more curse spells you control attached to it, you may return one of those spells to your spellbook, instead of placing it in your discard pile. Blood Reaper: When a friendly non-Legendary demon creature comes into play, you may make it your Bloodreaper. Warlock loses Life equal to the creature's Level +1, then places the Bloodreaper marker on it. Bloodreaper gains the Bloodthirsty +2 trait. The first time each round that it attacks and damages a Living creature, the Warlock may heal 2 damage. If it is destroyed, you may assign the marker in the same manner when a new demon is summoned. Battle Skill: Warlock has the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Arcane school, and an elemental school of his choice: Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Arcane Zap: [Mana Cost = 1] [Quick] [Ranged:0-1] [Dice=3] [Ethereal] [Counts as an attack spell. May be cast once per round.] Basic Melee Attack: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=3]

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Mage Abilities: Voltaric Shield: Each Upkeep Phase, the Wizard may pay 2 mana to activate his Voltaric Shield (flip the shield marker to the ON side). The first time the Wizard is attacked and dealt damage this round, if the shield is on, flip the shield marker to the off side, and cancel up to 3 points of damage. If the shield marker is still on at then end of the round, flip it to the off side.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Arcane school, and an elemental school of his choice: Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: [Ranged] [Zone Attack] [Light] [Dice=2] [d12] [4-9 = Daze; 10+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [Unavoidable] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time Chain Lightning damages a target, it may attack another target. That target must be in LoS of the last target, and may be up to 1 zone away from that target. Each successive attack rolls 1 fewer attack dice, and subtracts 1 more from the effect die roll. Chain Lightning can't attack the same target twice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Text
property.value: All animal creatures gain the Charge +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: As long as you control any of these animal creatures, your Mage gains these traits and abilities: Canine = Melee +1, Reptile = Armor +1, Bear = Tough -2, Ape = Climbing, Cat = Elusive.

property.name: Text
property.value: All animal creature's melee attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Flame Immunity, Hydro +3

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Deployment Phase, Battle Forge may cast one equipment spell.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Flame Immunity, Hydro +3, Epic, Warlock Only

property.name: Text
property.value: All demon creatures gain Melee +1. Once per game, as a full action, you may pay 12 mana to "Open the Gate", and make the above attack against each non-Flying creature up to 2 zones away from the Gate. Once open, whenever you summon a demon creature, you may place it in the Gate's zone, instead of your zone.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Wizard Only

property.name: Text
property.value: When Gate to Voltari comes into play, choose an opponent Mage. Whenever that Mage casts and resolves a spell, place 1 mana on Gate. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 3 or more mana on Gate, it may summon one Corporeal Arcane creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may give a Living creature Armor +1 or the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round. or you may heal 1 damage from it. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, you may choose and do one of these: Re-roll a Defense or Escape roll that you just rolled, or, if a friendly creature is the defender of an attack, you can re-roll the effect roll or all of the attack dice from that attack, Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Beastmaster Only

property.name: Text
property.value: During The Deployment Phase, Lair may summon 1 animal creature

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, each Living creature receives 1 point of direct poison damage.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: When Mana Siphon comes into play, choose a Mage up to 2 zones away and within LoS of this spell. That Mage gains Channeling -2 as long as Mana Siphon remains in play, and regardless of where the chosen Mage is in the arena.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Legendary, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in Mohktari's zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: All non-Mage creatures gain the Upkeep +1 trait. [Upkeep +1]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Incorporeal, Epic, Warlock Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time a different enemy creature is attacked and damaged by a friendly creature, place 1 mana on Pentagram. Pentagram may gain a maximum of 2 mana per round this way. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Pentagram, it may summon 1 Dark Living creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase all Living creatures in Poison Gas Cloud's zone receive 2 points of direct poison damage. If a Living creature enters this zone, or starts its Action Phase in this zone, it may not take more than one move action this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures and conjurations gain the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, before or after a friendly creature's Action Phase, you may destroy a creature you control and own to give a friendly creature the Melee +X and Piercing +X trait until the end of the round. X = the destroyed creature's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever any non-Mage creature takes a move action, its controller must first pay 1 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Restrained. Tanglevine cannot target creatures with the Flying or Uncontainable traits. Ranged attacks cannot target Tanglevine.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Epic, Holy Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Up to twice per round, you may have a friendly cleric creature use a full action to place 1 mana on Temple of Asyra. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Temple of Asyra, it may summon 1 Holy creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may choose a value of X from 1 to the number of temples you control, and pay X mana to make the above attack, adding X to the effect die roll. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: [Blocks Line of Sight] [Passage Attack] [Dice=2] [Creatures which pass through this wall, receive a number of attacks equal to their Level -1. Examples: A Level 3 creature is attacked twice, a Level 1 is not attacked.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Regenerate 2, Living, Flame +2, Hydro Immunity, Extendable

property.name: Text
property.value: Creatures of Level 2 or higher must spend a full action to move through the Wall of Thorns.

property.value: Hellfire Scythe: [Quick] [Melee] [Fire] [Dice=4] [d12] [5-9 = Burn;10+= 2 Burn] [Defrost] Hellfire Sweep: [Full] [Melee] [Fire] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Burn;11+=2 Burn] [Sweeping] [Defrost]

property.value: Staff: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] Healing Light: [Full] [Ranged:0-1] [Heal] [Dice=1] [Heal target Living Creature the amount rolled.]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may pay 1 mana. If you do, Gremlin gains the Fast trait until the end of round, and each move action he takes this round is a Teleport to the next zone.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Familiar, Flying, Pest, Legendary, Nature Mage Only

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Flameblast: [Full] [Ranged:1-1] [Flame] [Dice=3] [d12] [5-9 = Burn; 10+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost] Hell Trident: [Quick] [Melee] [Flame] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Burn; 11+ = 2 Burn] [Defrost]

property.value: Sword: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] Redeeming Sacrifice: [Full] [Heal] [Dice=6] [Heal any Living creature in the arena the amount rolled. Then, destroy Gray Angel]

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in the same zone as Highland Unicorn gain the Regenerate 1 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Beak: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=1] [Piercing +1] Raven's Eye: [Quick] [Ranged:0-2] [Huginn may look at a target hidden enchantment. After looking, leave it face down (hidden).]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Familiar, Flying, Pest, Legendary, Arcane Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Huginn can cast only level 1-2 incantation spells.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, all Living creatures in Malacoda's zone receive 2 points of direct poison damage.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Leeching Bite: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] [Mana Drain +1] Gorging Bite: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=3] [Mana Drain +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is activated, you may pay 1 mana to give her the Flying trait until the end of her Action Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: All other friendly canine creatures in the same zone as Redclaw gain Armor +1 and the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: The Greatsword "Starfire": [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=5] [d12] [7-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [+1 vs. Nonliving or Dark Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, if a friendly creature is attacked and destroyed by an enemy creature, place a Wrath token on Valshalla, up to a maximum of 4 tokens. For each token on her, Valshalla gains Melee +1.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Windstorm: [Quick] [Melee] [Wind] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-10 = Push; 11+ = Push & Daze] [Ethereal] [+2 vs Incorporeal]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Melee +2 trait. [Melee +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Block during the Avoid Attack Step. Block counts as a Defense, and the attack is avoided. Then, destroy Block. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Block without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time this creature takes a move action, it receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Fast trait. [Fast]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Death Link may heal up to 2 damage from his Mage and place it on this creature as direct damage, regardless of distance or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this creature makes a non-spell ranged or melee attack, it rolls 2 fewer attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Decoy is revealed, destroy it. When this spell is destroyed its controller gains 2 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this spell is revealed, you may Teleport this creature to any zone in the Arena, then destroy Divine Intervention.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Aegis 1 trait. [Aegis 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Flying trait. [Flying]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Slow trait. [Slow]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Upkeep +2 trait. [Upkeep +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. This does not affect creatures with the Uncontainable trait. [Unmovable]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Defense, which is unaffected by conditions on this creature, including Incapacitated, Restrained, and Daze. [Defense 8+ 1x No Melee]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Defense, which is unaffected by conditions on this creature, including Incapacitated, Restrained, and Daze. [Defense 8+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, this creature receives 2 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmonize can only target an object that has the Channeling attribute. This object gains Channeling +1. [Channeling +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Ranged +1 trait. [Ranged +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Hellfire Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Hellfire Trap. Hellfire Trap immediately attacks that creature. Then, destroy Hellfire Trap.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature casts a quick spell, you must reveal Jinx during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is canceled and is returned to its owner's spellbook. Any mana spent to cast that spell is refunded to the caster's mana supply. Then, destroy Jinx.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time this creature casts and resolves a spell, it receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature loses the Flying trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures gain +1 attack die when attacking this creature. Creatures can only gain this bonus for the first attack they make each round against this creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Elusive trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Nullify during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is countered. Then, destroy Nullify.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each round, the first time this creature makes a melee or ranged attack, its controller must pay 2 mana during the Declare Attack Step, or else the attack is canceled. Pacify does not affect counterstrikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Regenerate 2 trait. /n [Regenerate 2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's quick action melee attacks gain the Counterstrike trait. The first time it makes a Counterstrike attack, destroy Retaliate.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Reverse Attack during the Avoid Attack Step. Redirect the attack back to the attacker, who now becomes the target of that attack. You become the controller of that attack. Then, destroy Reverse Attack. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Reverse Attack without effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Reverse Magic during the Counter Spell Step. You take control of that spell. Redirect it back to the caster, who now becomes the target of the spell. If the spell cannot target the caster, it is countered. Then, destroy Reverse Magic.

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Living creatures in this zone gain the Aegis 1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Teleport Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Teleport Trap. That creature is immediately teleported to a zone of your choice, up to 2 zones away. Then, destroy Teleport Trap.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Incapacitated, and gains Armor +6. You cannot reveal Turn to Stone during an action, such as an attack or spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attacks gain the Vampiric trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts or reveals a metamagic or mana spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Metamagic/Mana]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Frost -2 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick spell, this Mage may pay 2 mana to place an Armor +1 token on a target Living non-Mage creature up to one zone away. These tokens may stack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains a Defense. Defense 7+ 1x No Ranged

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and a Damage Barrier. Armor +2

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Flame -2 trait. Armor +2

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +1, and the Flame -2, Frost -2, and Lightning -2 traits. Armor +1

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic attack spell from your spellbook to Elemental Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts an enchantment spell that targets a friendly creature. [Casting Discount] [1] [Enchantment]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal flame damage. [Flame] [Melee +1] [Ranged +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever this Mage is targeted by a melee attack (except a Counterstrike), at the beginning of the Declare Attack Step, roll the effect die. On a 9+ the attack is canceled. The attacker may choose to attack a different target instead. This does not affect creatures with the Nonliving or Psychic Immunity traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal lightning damage. [Lightning] [Melee +1] [Ranged +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic incantation spell from your spellbook to Mage Wand. As a quick spell, you may pay 3 mana to change the bound spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, for each creature that has at least one curse you control attached to it, you may spend 1 mana to deal 1 direct damage to that creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a Holy enchantment or incantation spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Holy] [Enchantment] [Incantation]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts an animal creature spell. [Casting Discount] [1] [Animal]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits for all attacks he makes that deal light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts or reveals a curse spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Curse]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Celestial Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [5-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, as a quick spell, this Mage may pay 2 mana and target an animal creature up to 1 zone away and either give them the Melee +2 trait until end of round, or heal damage equal to the amount rolled on 2 attack dice.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Arcane Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [Ethereal] [Mana Drain 1] Arcane Blast: [Full] [Ranged:1-1] [Dice=3] [Ethereal] [Mana Drain 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time each round that each creature makes a melee attack against this Mage, its controller must pay 2 mana during the Declare Attack Step, as an additional cost of making that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Wind -3 trait. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Teleport target creature out of the arena. Place 3 Banish tokens on it. Remove 1 Banish token each Upkeep Phase. When the final token is removed, return the creature to the last zone that it occupied. While out of the arena, this creature cannot take any action, its action marker remains unchanged, and it can only be affected by attacked spells, conditions, or its own traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: The next time this round the target creature makes a melee attack, if that attack is not a Counterstrike, at the end of that action it may immediately make another quick action melee attack. This extra attack counts as part of the same attack action. Only one Battle Fury spell may be cast per round on hate same creature

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly animal creatures in the arena gain the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Fast and Charge +1 traits until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy the target. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (hidden plus reveal cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. X = equipment's casting cost. Then, destroy the chosen equipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: The target receives 5 attack dice of direct damage. The caster also heals damage equal to the damage received by the target creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roll 8 attack dice. The target loses that much mana from his mana supply. The caster gains mana equal to the mana lost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Elusive trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. If the target is Pushed through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, you must pay an additional 3 mana. This has no effect on Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal each friendly Living creature in the target zone the amount rolled on 5 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 8 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target is Incapacitated until the beginning of its next Action Phase, or until the end of the round, whichever comes first. Knockdown has no effect on Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 12 attack dice. Remove as many condition markers as you wish from target creature by paying their removal costs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Unavoidable trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack gains the Piercing +3 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove as many poison conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed poison enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (hidden and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy all enchantments attached to target object (both hidden and revealed).

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a destroyed Living creature from your discard pile and summon it to the caster's zone. X = target spell's mana cost plus its spell Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a creature summoned this round. Flip target creature's action marker to the active side. That creature may act normally this round. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature. X = target's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target hidden enchantment. Controller of target enchantment cannot reveal the enchantment once Seeking Dispel has been cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move target enchantment you control to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. X = 1 if the enchantment is hidden, or the Level of the enchantment if it is revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target falls asleep. Place a Sleep condition marker on it. Does not affect creatures with Psychic Immunity. Look up the value of X below: Level 1 = 4 mana Level 2 = 5 mana Level 3 = 6 mana Add 2 mana to the cost for each Level beyond 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move target enchantment to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. You now control that enchantment. X = the casting & reveal cost of target enchantment, plus you pay the casting & reveal cost of attaching it to the new target (as if you just cast and revealed the spell).

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Teleported to the target zone. X = 3 mana per zone moved away from its current zone. You must pay at least 3 mana even if the target is teleported to the same zone. This does not count as a move action for the creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Vampiric and Piercing +1 traits.
